name: BasilMarket - Christmas Theme v2
description:
BasilMarket - Christmas Theme v2

***************************************************************
The Theme
***************************************************************
Features of my BasilMarket - Christmas Theme v2 include:
• New banner
• New background
• New headers
• New menu
• Translucent/highlight menus
• New post gradient
• New buttons
• Changed Text colours
• Changed Sticky colours

Here is a preview of my theme. (Its a big picture, so it might take a while to load)
Day: http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo142/Dumbfugi/BasilMarket%20-%20Christmas%20Theme/Preview_v2-Day.png
Night: http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo142/Dumbfugi/BasilMarket%20-%20Christmas%20Theme/Preview_v2-Night.png
